########### CMakeMaker autogenerated file ###########
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.6)

find_package(GTest)

set(cpp_files
  test_main.cc
  precomp.h
  precomp.cc
)

add_msvc_precompiled_header("precomp.h" "precomp.cc" cpp_files)
add_executable(driver ${cpp_files})

include_directories(driver
  ${GTEST_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ../cmd_scrum_statistics/assets
  ../cmd_scrum_statistics/source
  ../cmd_scrum_statistics/test
)

target_link_libraries(driver
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/../cmd_scrum_statistics/CMakeFiles/scrum_statistics.dir/./source/csv_reader.cc.o
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/../cmd_scrum_statistics/CMakeFiles/scrum_statistics.dir/./source/data_frame.cc.o
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/../cmd_scrum_statistics/CMakeFiles/scrum_statistics.dir/./source/graph_maker.cc.o
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/../cmd_scrum_statistics/CMakeFiles/scrum_statistics.dir/./source/scrum_printer.cc.o
  ${GTEST_LIBRARIES}
  libpthread.so
  libstdc++fs.a
)

add_dependencies(driver scrum_statistics ALL_PRE_BUILD)
